name: Seeker

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally DEF in the Arena by 30%.

skills.name: Devour
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Has a 25% chance of placing a [Provoke] debuff for 1 turn.
Damage based on: [ATK]

Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 6 Damage +10%
Lvl. 7 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 8 Damage +10%

skills.name: Tailwind
skills.raw_description:
Fills the Turn Meter of all allies by 30%. Places a 50% [Increase ATK] buff on all allies for 2 turns. Grants an Extra Turn.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 3 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Dark Blood
skills.raw_description: Heals this Champion by 20% HP and places a 60% [Increase DEF] buff on all allies for 2 turns on when hit with a critical hit. hay Sr
